title: Business Practical Skills Enhancement: Gamification Simulation for Explosion Accident Response Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic first aid and theoretical knowledge of explosion incidents
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe at least three initial response procedures for explosion incidents
Learners demonstrate the ability to judge hazardous areas and establish evacuation routes with 85% accuracy in a simulation environment
Learners successfully perform role allocation and collaborative procedures more than five times in team-based training

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
